subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: With a round of five-under-par 67 that included six birdies and a bogey, Anthony Kim took a one-stroke lead over Jim Furyk in the third round of the Chevron World Challenge.
snippet: With a round of five-under-par 67 that included six birdies and a bogey, Anthony Kim took a one-stroke lead over Jim Furyk in the third round of the Chevron World Challenge.
